name: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio website built with Vue.js and TypeScript
paragraphs: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing my skills and projects.
Designed with a focus on clean UI/UX and optimal performance across devices.
Implemented using Vue.js 3 and TypeScript to ensure type safety and maintainability.

name: Task Management API
description: RESTful API for task management application
paragraphs: Scalable REST API built with Node.js and Express for managing tasks and projects.
Features include user authentication, task scheduling, and notifications.
Deployed on AWS using containerization for improved scalability and reliability.

name: E-commerce Platform
description: Complete e-commerce solution with admin dashboard
paragraphs: Full-featured e-commerce platform with customer-facing storefront and admin dashboard.
Includes inventory management, order processing, payment integration, and analytics.
Built with React frontend and Node.js backend, hosted on AWS infrastructure.

name: Analytics Dashboard
description: Real-time analytics dashboard for business metrics
paragraphs: Interactive dashboard for visualizing business KPIs and performance metrics in real-time.
Features customizable widgets, data filtering, and export functionality.
Built with Vue.js and D3.js for responsive and interactive data visualizations.

name: Content Management System
description: Custom CMS for managing digital content
paragraphs: Custom content management system for digital publishers and content creators.
Supports various content types, media management, and publishing workflows.
Built on WordPress core with extensive customizations for improved performance.

name: Mobile Weather App
paragraphs: Cross-platform mobile app providing accurate weather forecasts and alerts.
Features include hourly and weekly forecasts, radar maps, and severe weather notifications.
Built with React Native and integrates with multiple weather data providers.

name: Machine Learning Service
description: ML service for data classification and prediction
paragraphs: Machine learning microservice for data classification and predictive analytics.
Implements various ML algorithms for text analysis, recommendation systems, and anomaly detection.
Deployed as containerized service on AWS with auto-scaling capabilities.

name: Blockchain Explorer
paragraphs: Web application for exploring and visualizing blockchain transactions and data.
Features include transaction history, block details, and address information.
Built with React and integrates with multiple blockchain networks.

name: Social Media Dashboard
description: Unified dashboard for managing multiple social media accounts
paragraphs: Comprehensive dashboard for managing and analyzing multiple social media accounts.
Features include content scheduling, analytics, and engagement tracking.
Built with Vue.js frontend and Node.js backend with MongoDB for data storage.

name: Video Streaming Platform
description: Custom video hosting and streaming service
paragraphs: Scalable video hosting and streaming platform with adaptive bitrate playback.
Features include video transcoding, content protection, and analytics.
Built with React frontend and Node.js backend, leveraging AWS media services.

name: IoT Home Automation
description: Smart home automation system using IoT devices
paragraphs: Comprehensive home automation system integrating various IoT devices and sensors.
Features include lighting control, climate monitoring, and security management.
Built with Python backend, React frontend, and MQTT messaging protocol.

name: AR Navigation App
paragraphs: Mobile application utilizing augmented reality for enhanced navigation and wayfinding.
Features include AR direction overlay, points of interest, and offline maps.
Built with Swift and ARKit for iOS with real-time location tracking.
